thread.section_title: Europcar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Europcar | www.europcar.ie
thread.title: Fred Nelson

author: Fred Nelson
title: Fred Nelson
text: I recently booked a car with Europcar. All I needed was a small car for a day, however the gentleman at the counter upgraded my booking to a medium sized car for the same price. He explained every single detail and was very courteous. The car was new and very clean. I found it cheaper to rent the car than to book a taxi! Highly recommend Europcar to anyone considering booking a car.
